explanation: [0-0] A man crouches by the roadside, wearing a white short-sleeve shirt and light blue jeans. He holds a lighter in his right hand and a white string in his left. Beside him is a brick wall, and behind him stands another person, with cars and a yellow building in the background.

[0-10] The man places the white string, which is a firecracker, on the red brick in front of him. The scene switches to a close-up of the man as he lights the lighter, which then goes out. He raises his hand to his forehead, and the scene switches to him holding the firecracker. The scene changes again to show him crouching by the red brick, trying to light the firecracker, jumping each time he attempts.
